alert.note: Alert for Gates; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NORTHAMPTON... CENTRAL HERTFORD...NORTHWESTERN GATES...SOUTHEASTERN GREENSVILLE... SOUTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...SOUTHAMPTON AND SOUTHEASTERN SUSSEX COUNTIES...THE CITY OF FRANKLIN AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF SUFFOLK THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Claresville to Winton. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Boykins, Newsoms, and Como around 720 PM EDT. Suffolk and Roduco around 725 PM EDT. Franklin and Courtland around 735 PM EDT. Hunterdale around 740 PM EDT. Sedley around 745 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Vicksville, Tunis, Grizzard, Booker, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Yale, Lumberton, Dort, and Hilda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
